tips.title: Welcome to Chromohub v.2.0
tips.html:
You can quickly get familiar with the main features of the Chromohub by reading these tips. You may try out the features described in the tips. If you close the dialog, you can always get back to it from the Help main menu item.

If you find this resource helpful in your research, thank you for citing the following article:
Liu L, Zhen XT, Denton E, Marsden BD, Schapira M., Bioinformatics (2012): ChromoHub: a data hub for navigators of chromatin-mediated signalling [pubmed]
